faqs.q: How many calories in an espresso martini?
faqs.a: Approximately 250 kcal for a standard serving.

faqs.q: Are espresso martinis high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, about 15 g sugars per serving from liqueur and syrup.

faqs.q: What's the carb count in an espresso martini?
faqs.a: Around 20 g carbs, primarily from added sugars.

faqs.q: Does the type of vodka affect calories in espresso martini?
faqs.a: Minimal impact; flavored vodkas may add 10-20 kcal.

faqs.q: How to make a lower-calorie espresso martini?
faqs.a: Skip syrup, use diet liqueur, or opt for half portions to cut ~50-100 kcal.
